title: Unlock pro player picks with LCS Finals bundles

replies.body: Hey fellow summoners, i have decided to quit league and i was wondering if anyone wants to trade my account off me. Im willing to trade it for csgo skins or steam codes for NZ. Add me on steam ( Erotic Eggplant) for more details. Thanks!
Pretty sure selling your account isn't allowed dude. :o

As per the terms of use every player agrees upon when playing League:

> D. Account Sales. The Account supplied to you is personal to you, and Riot Games does not recognize and _expressly forbids the transfer of user Accounts_. You shall not **purchase, sell, gift or trade any Account, or make any such offer**, and any attempt shall be null and void. Any distribution by you of your Account and/or your Login Credentials (except as expressly provided herein or otherwise explicitly approved of by Riot Games) may result in suspension or termination of your Account.
You realise this guy most likely doesn't own the account "Erotic Eggplant" and is just trying to get it banned.
You know his name is  Im Zed Sheeran right?
Erotic Eggplant would be his Steam stupido
Don see any discount from those bundles...
